channel.title: Need A Team! 7 Postions Open. Big Project!
channel.description:
I'm currently looking for :
[ul][li]3 Programmers[/li] [li]2-3 Graphic Designers (Create Custom Items/NPC)[/li] [li]1 Web Developer [/li][/ul]
This will be a huge project because we are starting from a blank 474 server. There are a lot of ideas I have and hopefully you will as well. Once we have the team together I will describe all the details and ideas i have for the server, but till then it will remain unsaid to help not spread the ideas to other servers. As far as server cost go, I bought a IBM E server so we will be hosting it off that. So no need to worry about server costs. There will be a lot of work and we will all need to work as a team, so if your not good in team environments this is probably not for you :/
Feel free to contact me at [email]Inception.eScape@gmail.com[/email].
Make Sure to leave the following.
[ul][li]Name[/li] [li]Field (Programmer, Graphic Design, Web Developer)[/li] [li]Experience in field[/li] [li]Why you should join the team?[/li][/ul]
Hope to meet you soon! GrayAng3l
